body:
### Welcome to idsp_courseware.

Supporting courseware for an Introductory course on Signal Processing. I used this documents while teaching the course Introductory Digital Signal Processing at [Tampere University of Technology][tut] (Finland). Hopefully you will find some of these materials useful!

[tut]: http://www.tut.fi

## License

Released under the [Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike licence][licence].

[licence]: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: idsp_courseware
